post:
GreenValueHost - True Web Hosting at Great Value™
http://www.greenvaluehost.com

Do you want your very own high performance server, but don't want to pay the up front costs for quality? No problem! Our SSD Cached OpenVZ Virtual Private Servers are the perfect solution.

We understand that times are tough, and not everybody can afford to dish out high investments for their online presence. That's why starting at only $3.95/month, you can buy a powerhouse of a server equipped with enterprise Samsung SSDs, E3v2 CPUs, DDR3 ECC RAM, and more than plenty of RAID protected disk space available.

To kick off the launch of the summer season and the launch of our SSD Cached OpenVZ VPS Hosting services, we are offering a whopping 35% OFF discount off your first payment on ANY payment term, valid for any VPS hosting plan. All you need to do is enter the coupon code "LETSGOSSD" at checkout!

Now that we introduced you to what we have to offer, let's take a look at the features! Each VPS hosting plan features..

  • OpenVZ Virtualization
  • SSD Cached RAID Disk Space
  • SolusVM VPS Management Panel
  • 45 Day Money Back Guarantee
  • Instant Activation
  • Location: New York, USA
Virtual Private Server Hosting Plans
